author: LukasEbeling
body:
**PR description**
This PR adds the L1 emulator code for the topological trigger. 

A validation of the emulation is found here:
[validation.pdf](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/22882580/validation.pdf)

The (q)keras model itself as well as the training scripts can be found [here](https://gitlab.cern.ch/lebeling/topo-new)

Find [here](https://github.com/cms-hls4ml/TOPO/pull/1) a draft PR of the current hls model.
title: L1 emulator of topological trigger for cms-sw
